content:
Certainly! Here are some websites and resources that can provide more information on climate change adaptation efforts in São Tomé and Príncipe, and ways to support these efforts:

1. The Global Environment Facility: https://www.thegef.org/country/s%C3%A3o-tom%C3%A9-and-pr%C3%ADncipe

2. UNDP in São Tomé and Príncipe: https://www.st.undp.org/

3. African Development Bank in São Tomé and Príncipe: https://www.afdb.org/en/countries/central-africa/sao-tome-and-principe

4. HBD: http://www.hbdong.org/

5. Climate Reality Project: https://www.climaterealityproject.org/blog/how-climate-change-impacting-island-nations

6. The Climate Group: https://www.theclimategroup.org/

7. The Climate Institute: https://www.climateinstitute.org.au/

These websites offer information on ongoing efforts to address climate change and ways to support these efforts in São Tomé and Príncipe. You can also reach out to these organizations to explore opportunities to get involved and support their work.
